attributes.action: Make all agencies e.g. think tanks, with charitable status reveal the names of their donors.
attributes.additional_details: We read in reports produced by agencies with charitable status e.g. think tanks, that they have been produced independently from government, quangos and other agencies and yet we do not know who donates to these charities. If the coalition government is indeed keen on transparency in all areas then make charities reveal the names of their donors so people can determine for themselves whether they are 'independent' or not.
